summary: This is an email chain from November 2019 forwarding a draft indictment and press release related to the MCC (Metropolitan Correctional Center) case. It shows coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and another office (likely OAG) regarding the timing of grand jury proceedings and public announcements.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Sender and recipient of the email chain; was at the doctor and asked to forward materials; involved in coordinating the release of indictment and press release.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Recipient of the forwarded email; part of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Tova Noel
persons.context: Named in the draft indictment and press release (based on attachment filename 'Tova_Noel_et_al_PR_v2.docx'); subject of the MCC case.

connections.description: Both are officials at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York; Strauss is forwarding information to Berman.
Strauss is involved in coordinating the indictment and press release related to Tova Noel's case.

events.title: MCC Indictment Coordination
events.description: Email exchange regarding the forwarding of a draft indictment and press release for the MCC case, with grand jury proceedings scheduled for the following morning.

events.title: Grand Jury Proceedings
events.description: Grand jury was scheduled for 10 a.m. on November 19, 2019, to vote on the MCC indictment.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plow (likely a typo for 'Place'), New York, NY - Address of the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The email discusses coordination on the indictment and press release for the MCC (Metropolitan Correctional Center) case, involving Tova Noel.
Grand jury proceedings were scheduled for 10 a.m. on November 19, 2019.
The communication was marked as confidential and for 'awareness' only, requested by OAG (likely Office of the Attorney General).
The email shows real-time coordination between legal offices regarding the timing of legal actions and public announcements.
